content: learn a quick and easy border for any crochet project this is a final round tutorial that is worked off of a foundation row the link to the tutorial includes written instructions a photo tutorial and a link to a youtube video tutorial as well *************** if you love this tutorial and would like to stay up to date know about sales and new releases sign up for the sweet potato 3 newsletter https //www subscribepage com/sweetpotato3newsletter check out the patterns on my blog www sweetpotato3 com follow on instagram https //www instagram com/sweetpotato3patterns/ join an interactive crochet group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/sp3crochetconversation the pattern is available for instant download once the payment has been processed see more patterns from sweet potato 3 by visiting my ravelry shop at https //www ravelry com/designers/sweet-potato-3 please note that the listing is for a pattern to make the item yourself this is not a listing for the physical/completed crochet piece the pattern comes in a pdf format and is in u s english instructions only due to the nature of patterns all sales are final however i am available for questions and assistance through email or through my facebook group please do not use images without permission
